channel.title: Client coding help
channel.description:
Hello guys,
I want to create a whole new look for my client, like a new (bigger background) and my own menu bars and stuff with own made GFX, but I've got no clue where I can edit the sizes/gfx and stuff. Can anyone help me and send me a good starting client to try on?
